Description: Describes the disadvantage of having a poor "regeneration speed" value. Essentially this means that when the subject's own health is regenerating, it will go slower than usual.

French.Translation: Le sujet régénère sa santé moins rapidement.

Italian.Translation: La salute del soggetto migliorerà più lentamente.

Spanish.Translation: El sujeto recuperará salud más despacio.

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: O indivíduo regenera saúde mais devagar.

Japanese.Translation: 対象の体力リジェネが遅くなる。

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: 實驗對象生命值恢復速度較慢。

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 使用者的生命值恢复速度减慢。

name: BoosterImplants.Effects.RegenerationSpeedDescriptionNegative
